title: Advanced Sight Component
description: Component which provides advanced sight capabilities to character based actors
longDescription:
Character component implemented in 100% c++ code which allows for easy integration of advanced sight capabilities to any character. This is useful for characters which look around but do not change orientation of their main mesh. It can also be used to fine tune sight events, such as when you want to implement a threat meter. This component accurately detects all blocking objects by raycasting against the visibility channel. You can integrate this with first person, third person or VR environments. Sight detection can be further customized with individual character "hotspots" so that sight events only trigger if some portion or item on a character is seen.


Discord for support, questions, feedback and requests: https://discord.gg/Baf3m9

Version 1.1 adds two features requested by the user community:

  1. A built in threat meter output which optionally incorporates distance based measures and is updated in real time (e.g. every frame)
  2. The ability to filter on zero or more tags with a tag array filter
